name: The Beasts of Keelbarrow Coast
description:
The old lighthouse of Keelbarrow Coast needs a new keeper, after the old ones either leave after one night or disappear before sunrise. 

Be vigilant and perceptive to ensure the safety of yourself and the land behind you. Your former colleagues left you their notes to guide you through the night.

This game was made during the Godot Wild Jam 41 with the Theme "Ocean".
